name: Robin Hood (GBC)
description: Become the legendary Robin Hood as he ventures to seek out and defeat the evil Sheriff of Nottingham! The sheriff has raised the taxes so high that the peasants and merchants of the land can barely afford to eat. Through 19 exciting action and adventure levels, use Robin Hood's weapons including the infamous Longbow as he battles to rid the land of the ruthless sheriff and his dark servants before finally confronting his arch enemy Prince John!
